document.full_text: roger federer, novak djokovic and andy roddick each launched their title bids in triumphant style at the indian wells atp tournament on sunday without losing a set in the second round.
document.title: federer, djokovic and roddick reach third round
lines_and_colors: roger federer, novak djokovic and andy roddick each launched their title bids in triumphant style at the indian wells atp tournament on sunday without losing a set in the second round.
